reviews.review_msg: A humorous prof. He has excellent notes, a moderate midterm and a hard final.

Well...he is the only choice u can take for 283 and 388, i took his 283... TOUGH prof, good in teaching, patient, but not really considering for his students. If u want to pass his course, stay with absolute awake in the class and try to do more homework... it is insane to take 6 engineering courses in a semester,and 283 is the hardest among them.
Stay consistent with homework, midterm and final exam are exact questions from the text book.  Good Prof and really passionate about his work.  Study hard, not a easy course by far.
